ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh darn, like the enchanter wouldn t happily tag along for a few choice items such a group could provide.  Heck he d be happy with the junk loot they leave on
ygData.messageBody:
Oh darn, like the enchanter wouldn't happily tag along for a few choice
items such a group could provide. Heck he'd be happy with the junk loot
they leave on dead mobs. Come to think of it, anyone need a lvl 16
enchanter on Sol Ro? Available for useless grouping with guys who can
resurrect her and provide her with handouts for out-buffing their 49th level
bard.

Kit and Alyssa

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 3:15 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Attack speedups


From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>

Yea, but someone is not gonna get xp if you group like that. <g>

Sylly

> From: <kim@...>
>
> The reason I find it nauseating is because a group with a L49
> bard can improve their performance by getting a L16 enchanter
> to buff them.
